sterilization noun [U]
(STOP CHILDREN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of having a medical operation to make it impossible to have children: My wife and I have discussed sterilization, but we haven't made a decision about it yet.

sterilization noun [U]
(MEDICAL OPERATION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of having a medical operation to make it impossible to produce young, or the condition of being unable to produce young: The compound causes sterilization in certain types of flies.
sterilization noun [U]
(MAKING CLEAN)
the process of making something completely clean and free from bacteria: Sterilization of milk products kills dangerous bacteria.
